channel.title: Do you prefer old graphics or newer graphics?
channel.description:
Title says it all. I despise 474+ graphics so I prefer my old graphics
By the way, by new graphics I mean stuff like this and beyond:
[img]http://s11.postimg.org/59fg2ca1f/GIAlc_Dm.png[/img]

item.title: Do you prefer old graphics or newer graphics?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:25, topic:551231”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=670148.msg4481559#msg4481559 date=1430382812]
At least it isn’t spinning.
[/quote]
That’s only because we’re not allowed to have animated gifs as avatars.[/quote]
everything was fine when it was just the mods of mitb.com when you started throwing in the moparscapers everything went to shit.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you prefer old graphics or newer graphics?

anyway, i like 08-11

item.title: Do you prefer old graphics or newer graphics?
item.dc:creator: @runerunerune runerunerune
item.description:
@runerunerune wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

devious mud was gowlers first crack at a multi user dungeon and aspects of it made it over to runescape (now considered runescape classic)

i have heard about it but always wondered whenever i read about it what the name was about.

multi user dungeon… i see and a devious multi user dungeon as-well, possibly he always intended to add a dungeneering type aspect to runescape?

Read full topic

item.title: Do you prefer old graphics or newer graphics?
item.dc:creator: @runerunerune runerunerune
item.description:
@runerunerune wrote:

to the op picture, i don’t mind those graphic they are not too different to the familiar old graphics, its just the UI that i don’t like.

and on the real new pictures sk8er dude posted i know that they are considered advanced graphics but i just think they are really shit. it looks messy, confusing and ugly to me especially the armour.
and what does “deviousmud” even mean?

Read full topic

item.title: Do you prefer old graphics or newer graphics?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

I think its easiest to suggest that people are going to prefer the style they played most on. For example I would prefer rsc and early rs2 because thats when I actually played the game. However others younger than myself may prefer runetek5 graphics because thats what they used when playing the game.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you prefer old graphics or newer graphics?
